page.title: 16GAMES cont.
page.content:
Out of the people we asked in Stanley most children had computers.The most popular were the C_64 and SPECTRUM.Most people liked the arcade style games.Not very many people had monitors and the average playing time was 2_4 hours per day.Nearly everyone has a joystick and only a few people have a disc drive.
"My favourite indoor game is the Atari 2600.I have 5 video tapes BATTLEZONE,CENTIPEDE,FOOTBALL,TENNIS and COMBAT. I also have a remote control car and a mini MUNCHMAN but no SPACE INVADERS.My favourite outdoor game is football,I own a BMX RALEIGH NIGHT BURNER.I go to the swimming baths and sports centre in Stanley. My favourite football team is MANCHESTER UNITED".
